QuestData.Title: The Butcher of Taurajo
QuestData.Description: This operative had orders to secure the roadways between the Alliance command and Fort Triumph. General Hawthorne is on the move.$B$B<Bloodhilt crumples the documents in his fist.>$B$BIt's HIM, $n! Hawthorne - I spit the name - he is the one who ordered the assault on Taurajo! Now we know when and where to strike him down. Quickly, follow the road north of the Battlescar and meet up with my assassin Karthog. CRUSH Hawthorne and string his body up along the road!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Find Karthog alongside the road north of the Battlescar. Together, ambush and destroy the Butcher of Taurajo.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Karthog, then lure out and assassinate General Hawthorne.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Bloodhilt roars impatiently.>$B$BIs the deed done? Tell me! What news?
QuestData.RewardText: <Upon hearing the news, Bloodhilt snorts. His eyes gleam. He tips his head back and bellows a wet, cackling laugher that echoes between the blackened walls of Desolation hold and reverberates throughout the hills beyond.>$B$BSo it is done! The Butcher of Taurajo is felled at last. Cut down in the streets like a dog. Fitting.$B$BYou have done well, $n. You've sowed fear into our enemies, and soon we will reap the harvest!
